name: Exton|Defender Super Rescue System (SRS)
short_description:
Exton|Defender SRS (version 150531 and 140403) is a Linux system available as a Live DVD (Fedora and Mageia) for repairing your system and data after a crash. It aims to provide an easy way to carry out admin tasks on your computer.

Exton|Defender is based on Fedora 22 64bit (version 150531) and  Mageia 4 32bit (version 140403).

SYSTEM TOOLS INCLUDED: NTFS-3g, GParted, PartImage, Shred, Sfdisk (util-linux-ng), Rsync, Ddrescue, FSArchiver, TestDisk, Safecopy and Midnight Commander. Other programs (among many others): Google Chrome (in fc22 for running Netflix), LibreOffice, NetworkManager, Firefox, Thunderbird, Gimp, Samba, JDK and Java Runtime Environment (JRE), kernel headers (Fedora), Emacs and many compilation tools. Desktop environment:  Cinnamon 2.4.8 (Fedora) and LXDE (Mageia). When installing to a USB pen drive: All system changes are PERSISTENT.
summary: Exton|Defender aims to provide an easy way to carry out admin tasks
